description:
The move to nosetest appears to have broken the ability to run individual tests.

This works:
./run_tests.sh

but this doesn't:
./run_tests.sh test_libvirt

The database fails to setup when running individual tests.
title: Can't run individual unit tests

comments.content:
The move to nosetest appears to have broken the ability to run individual tests.

This works:
./run_tests.sh

but this doesn't:
./run_tests.sh test_libvirt

The database fails to setup when running individual tests.
